meanings.definition: Having all the necessary components or features in a small space.
meanings.sent1: The tiny house was the compactest home I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was so compactest that it easily fit in the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent3: The compactest car on the market could still comfortably seat four people.
meanings.sent4: Her compactest backpack held all her school supplies with room to spare.
meanings.sent5: The compactest laptop was powerful despite its small size.

meanings.definition: To make something more closely packed or dense.
meanings.sent1: She compactest her clothes tightly into the suitcase for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The workers compactest the soil to create a stable foundation.
meanings.sent3: He compactest the snow into a snowball and threw it playfully.
meanings.sent4: The chef compactest the ingredients into a perfect burger patty.
meanings.sent5: The students compactest their notes into a neat study guide.

meanings.definition: The most closely packed or dense.
meanings.sent1: The compactest of the boxes held the most items.
meanings.sent2: The closet was organized with the compactest of storage solutions.
meanings.sent3: The compactest of the books on the shelf was the dictionary.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the compactest of the trees provided the most shade.
meanings.sent5: The compactest of the rocks in the pile was the heaviest.
